cards.title: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora’s First Story Pack, The Sky Breaker, Out Now
cards.content: Players who haven’t experienced the Western Frontier yet can also play a free trial of the main game.

cards.title: Star Wars Outlaws and Assassin’s Creed Shadows Reveal New Gameplay, XDefiant Season 1 Details Announced
cards.content: Get ready to take on crime syndicates, fight through feudal Japan, build your own Roman empire, and so much more.

cards.title: Assassin’s Creed Shadows Shows Off New Combat and Stealth Gameplay
cards.content: Assassin’s Creed Shadows revealed gameplay highlighting samurai combat as Yasuke and stealthy shinobi tactics as Naoe

cards.title: New Star Wars Outlaws™ Gameplay: Sneaking Into Hutt Territory On Tatooine
cards.content: At Ubisoft Forward, a new gameplay showcase video follows Kay Vess on a mission to Mos Eisley to track down an expert gunslinger.

cards.title: XDefiant Unveils New Faction, Maps, and More at Ubisoft Forward
cards.content: GS-Kommando brings the tactical thunder in Season 1, along with new weapons and Capture the Flag, starting July 2.

cards.title: Anno 117: Pax Romana Coming in 2025
cards.content: Become a governor and reshape the destiny of an empire as the city-building franchise heads to Ancient Rome.
